title: HoP 330 - Republic of Letters - Italian Humanism
itunes:title: HoP 330 - Republic of Letters - Italian Humanism
description: Coluccio Salutati and Leonardo Bruni combine eloquence with philosophy, taking as their model the refined language and republican ideals found in Cicero.
